name: places/ChIJy41qLqRZwokRoHTVR4jdOhU
formattedAddress: 287 Park Ave S, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 287 Park Ave S, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Loved the ambiance and vibe of this place! Cocktails selection was phenomenal and the bartenders are happy to help craft something unique. Only critique is that the music could have been better.

text.text: Loved the ambiance and vibe of this place! Cocktails selection was phenomenal and the bartenders are happy to help craft something unique. Only critique is that the music could have been better.

originalText.text:
Amazing Bottle Service and Cocktails.
Literally I could be able to choose from a huge list of 15+ cocktails all very unique and studied. Really Suggest this place from everyone who want to spend a birthday party and have a lot of fun with good people, cocktails and atmosphere! ðŸŽ‰

originalText.text:
the drinks were fine, but def not anything i would come back for. the DJ was cool but the music got so loud and I felt like i was getting a headache by 12:30am or so.

we left a credit card with them for the tab and they swiped the wrong one on our bill. they ended up putting the $300 bill on the house but it was just strange

text.text:
the drinks were fine, but def not anything i would come back for. the DJ was cool but the music got so loud and I felt like i was getting a headache by 12:30am or so.

we left a credit card with them for the tab and they swiped the wrong one on our bill. they ended up putting the $300 bill on the house but it was just strange

originalText.text:
honestly a great location for a manhattan venue, entrance is on 22nd street. loved the DJ who was playing so decided to try this place as it was walking distance from home

went for nico de andrea and the music was absolutely amazing - nico did a fantastic job his entire 3 hour setâ€¦ wow wow .. decor for the party also looked very nice

as for the venue.. since itâ€™s newer, will give some honest feedback -

not enough bathrooms - loved that they were each individual bathrooms for men / women but 4 stalls in a space that holds 500 people (and only serves liquor) is simply not enough & causes the vibey scene with the curtain entrances to be ruined with people queueing everywhere

staff was overall unkind & meh, except for the few gentlemen walking around the club picking up after everyone

not enough people checking the crowd and controlling people who were absolutely trashed and truly needed to exit

music was far too loud. i understand itâ€™s a small space and not necessarily designed for music, the speaker placement makes the dance floor too loud to enjoy the music for long periods of time. i consistently measured the sound decibels higher than 116, which is exceedingly ridiculous for such a small space. for reference, the loudest iâ€™ve measured at another space in NYC was 105db at brooklyn mirage. if you have ear plugs, bring them

also the bar only serving liquor, no beer, is kind of a bummer. i get their bartenders are mixologists but honestly sometimes you just want a cold beer! additionally, no bottles of water to purchase - i had to buy a huge bottle of san pellegrino and ask the woman behind the bar to keep it in the fridge for me.

not sure if i would come back, it would 100% depend on the DJ

originalText.text: Came here for a social event and really liked the vibe! The cocktails were also good although on the pricier side. The decor of the space was very interesting and inspiring

text.text: Came here for a social event and really liked the vibe! The cocktails were also good although on the pricier side. The decor of the space was very interesting and inspiring
